ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A Realization...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... After my skills capped at level 40, my normal dex with items was about 130.  Between 40 and 46, I missed 3 notes in a row just twice.  After I got some
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 5 Apr 2000, Marc Allie wrote:
>
> Didn't GZ state that the effect of Dex on missing notes in songs
> capped at 100? Unless I am going to miss SUBSTANTIALLY more notes
> with 107 Dex than I do now at 114, I can see no reason not to switch.

After my skills capped at level 40, my normal dex with items
was about 130. Between 40 and 46, I missed 3 notes in a row
just twice. After I got some planes equipment (my first
planes trip was at 47), my normal dex dropped to 114 I think.
Since then, I've missed 4 notes in a row two times, and 3
notes in a row four or five times.

Anecdote is a very statistically unsound form of evidence, but
I've been too busy testing haste/slowdowns lately to test
missed notes (which are just an annoyance - they don't really
have much impact on my effectiveness).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
